select t1.video_id, t1.video_name, t1.video_episode, t1.video_broadcast_time, t1.video_type, t1.video_season, t1.video_country, t1.video_source, t1.video_remark, t1.create_time, t1.last_update_time, t1.have_bd_resource , t1.video_detail_info , t2.video_id,t2.resource_type, t2.resource_format, t2.resource_resolution, t2.resource_sub, t2.resource_sub_type, t2.resource_record_time, t2.resource_record_address, t2.resource_remark from video_info t1 LEFT JOIN video_resource_info t2 ON t1.video_id = t2.video_id where t1.video_id = #{video_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
